name: SleepingSounds
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleeping sounds
des:
Sleeping Sounds is a premium sound skill designed to help you drift off to sleep. We have 10 different sounds and complex features such as sleep timers and more. 

Here are the commands you'll want to know. 

 Alexa, ask sleeping sounds to play fire sounds
Alexa, ask sleeping sounds to play storm sounds for 5 hours
 Alexa, ask sleeping sounds to list sounds
 Alexa ask sleeping sounds to play a random track 

 Our Sounds: 
Fire Sounds
Island Sounds
Rain Sounds
Forest Sounds
Storm Sounds
Waterfall Sounds
Ocean Sounds
Healing Sounds
Rejuvenating Sounds
Jungle Sounds

We hope you love this skill. We are always iterating, so let us know what you want to see. Feel free to reach out to contact@stokedskills.com for feedback!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
